basics.name: Ty Walters
basics.label: Data Analyst
basics.summary: I graduated from Arizona State University in December of 2019 with a degree in Business Data Analytics. Currently, I am a Business Intelligence Seasonal Intern with the Phoenix Suns.

education.institution: WHU - Otto Beisheim School of Management

work.summary: Seasonal intern with the business intelligence department for the 2019-20 season
highlights: Automated ETL process from the new Phoenix Suns Mobile Wallet (via Braintree API) into the data warehouse for reporting
Evaluate the Suns resell market and ensure ticket holders were complying with their policies on reselling tickets through Stubhub API
Applied SQL to transform and manipulate data then create dashboards in Spotfire
Optimized regression models for total attendance and merchandise budgeting to prep for the season

work.summary: Summer internship with the analytics department during the 2019 season
highlights: Automated process of retrieving post-match survey responses as a new data source containing 500k+ records through SurveyMonkey API
Prospect identification in database with over 70k fans using SAS Enterprise Guide
Designed executive level reports on potential jersey sponsors that met predetermined criteria
Developed detailed research reports for corporate partnership team on potential sponsors

work.summary: Applied research project commissioned by a Major English Premier League Club
highlights: Coded in-game events and behaviors for over 2,000 videos
1 of only 5 people out of 20 coders to be promoted from part time to a full-time position
